title: Spending
text:
Here you can see the expenditures of political parties in the lead-up to the elections according to the latest data.

5 May - 3 Jun 202428 May - 3 Jun 2024


During this period, political parties spent a total of €26,863 and displayed 290 advertisements on Meta.
